short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to share your screen when streaming on CareerFairy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows CareerFairy streamers to share their screen from the comfort of their browser. Once installed, just click on "Start Sharing Screen" within the streaming page to start sharing any part of your screen.
